xml.name: Delete parameter names
xml.Text: GoLand highlights only names of unused parameters if their types are used for implementing a method specification. In this case, you can either rename this parameter to _ or remove its name completely.
xml.Try: If parameters are needed for a method to implement an interface, it is unsafe to remove them. Press ShowIntentionActions to see a list of possible options.
Select Delete parameter names and press EditorEnter.
